basic.Target Organism: Agrobacterium tumefaciens DSM 3129(MIC=0.2µg/ml),Brenneria salicis NCPPB 2530(MIC=0.02µg/ml),Escherichia coli NCTC 9001(MIC=0.1µg/ml),Pseudomonas syringae pv. tomato NCPPB 1106(MIC=0.2µg/ml),Sinorhizobium meliloti ZB314(MIC=0.1µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Newport(MIC=0.2µg/ml),Salmonella typhimurium ATCC 23565(MIC=0.1µg/ml),Serratia marcescens ATCC 17991(MIC=>200µg/ml),Shigella flexneri CP87(MIC=0.1µg/ml),Clavibacter michiganensis subsp. insidiosus NCPPB 1109(MIC=50µg/ml),Paenibacillus alvei LMG 6922(MIC=>200µg/ml),Bacillus megaterium QMB 1551(MIC=150µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis NRRL B-237(MIC=>200µg/ml),Bacillus thuringiensis serovar tenebrionis DSM 2803(MIC=>200µg/ml)
